name: FOGnet
description: What is the project about? Blockchain Based Real Estate Platform What makes your project unique? The FOGNET platform is a real estate NFT content platform based on the Ethereum blockchain network that can issue and trade the right to execute and sell real estate development projects as NFT. It can be said to be a new concept of real estate development finance mediated by NFT. By utilizing NFT, anyone can participate in the implementation project, lowering the entry barrier to real estate investment, and expecting the effect of making the real estate implementation project transparent and fair, where illegal and illegal evasion is prevalent. History of your project. 2022.4Q Marketplace & Wallet development 2023.1Q Empire NFT Sale, LBank & MEXC listing Whatâ€™s next for your project? We want to create a healthy NFT trading ecosystem based on real assets by discovering NFT contents that can be commercialized, and we plan to expand our service and business areas through the advancement and stabilization phase of the FOGNET platform. What can your token be used for? Key currency of FOGNET Platform Payment of fees incurred when issuing Empire NFT Payment method when purchasing Empire NFT Medium when using De-Fi service of FOGNET Platform Swap investment with Empire NFT staking
